text: Close to the concert venue a nice park and shopping Center
nice place and quite. slightly far away from center but quite
new clean close to two tube stations close to very big shopping center westfield. the room is a little bit small no windows in the room it takes about 30 min to reach the center
Hotel perfectly situated in the center of London cosy rooms very kind staff
This hotel is very closed to city center. the space is too small
Great value for money in the center of London. The room and fast WiFi
Bed comfortable staff extra polite and helpful. Wish there had been a business center
Amazing hotel brand new super comfortable in the city center Loved my stay there
City center and great location very good quality facilities great breakfast friendly professional staff Ten out of ten
Located in the center of city with walking distance to many attractions Clean room and great services. None
Pleasent clean hotel good location for tube Nice breakfast with lots of choice. Distance to the center of London
Excellent city center location great value for movie Lovely room. Not enough sockets for charges misplaced one probably under the table
Bed bath compliment minibar closeness to the center everything was superb. The reseptionist did not mention that the minibar is complimentary
Except the hotel facilities very close to bus station and Paddigton Station and of course close to London Center Oxford Str Hyde Park etc
Fantastic hotel in a great location the area has lovely village feel in the center of London close to all te attractions bars and restaurants
We loved the location near the park near the underground and in the center great facilities beutiful rooms with high standart. It is an expensive hotel
Excellent views and extremely comfortable bed Good location 2 minutes away from trains and a shopping center at your doorstep. More choice on the cooked breakfast items
Very good location right in the center of London you can do alot on foot from there Very good wifi connection very important these days Very friendly personnel and everything Clean
The decor and ambiance was really cool and felt like I was at the center of where everything was happening. Lobby lounges were a bit too loud to conduct business meetings
Welcoming cookie was delicious Just two minutes away from the design center and the Imperial Wharf train st. Took the staff a long time to solve a problem after our check out
